channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JDK-8347019] Test javax/swing/JRadioButton/8033699/bug8033699.java still fails: Focus is not on Radio Button Single as Expected
item.description:
----------System.out:(2/134)----------
[The Java(tm) Look and Feel - javax.swing.plaf.metal.MetalLookAndFeel]
Radio Button Group Go To Next Component through Tab Key failed
----------System.err:(26/1787)----------

item.summary: Test javax/swing/JRadioButton/8033699/bug8033699.java still fails: Focus is not on Radio Button Single as Expected

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

Test passes. SAP nightly testing passed.
